name: hello-time-man
description: 🕐 Simple CLI tool that shows current time with friendly greetings
author: rojojun

scripts.check-java: java -version || echo 'Java not found. Install from https://adoptium.net/'
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const binPath = path.join(__dirname, 'bin', 'hello'); if (fs.existsSync(binPath)) fs.unlinkSync(binPath); console.log('Cleaned!');"
